jobDescription: Washington Fertility Center is seeking a FT Medical Assistant to join our team. Candidate must be a graduate of and accredited CMA program and must be fluent in both Spanish and English. Only candidates meeting these requirements will be considered. Applicant must have an outgoing, friendly personality and be committed to providing exceptional patient care. This is NOT an entry level position. GYN experience a plus. This position offers generous compensation and excellent benefits. Qualified candidates may email their resume to pasmar@washingtonfertility.com
